        model = Bicycle
        fields = ["manufacturer", "model", "info", "photo"]




[docs]class BicycleAdminForm(forms.ModelForm):
    place = forms.ModelChoiceField(Place.objects.filter(bicycle=None))

        model = Bicycle
        exclude = ['image_tag', "photo"]
